content:
Yes, there are several walking tours in Rouen that focus on the city's history and architecture. Here are a few options to consider:

1. Rouen Walking Tours: This company offers several different walking tours of the city, including a tour of the Old Town and a tour of Rouen Cathedral. Their guides are knowledgeable and enthusiastic about the city's history and culture.

2. Happy Time Tours: This tour company offers a variety of walking tours, including a tour of the Old Town, a tour of the Impressionist painters' trail, and a tour of the Seine riverfront. Their tours are led by experienced local guides who are passionate about sharing the city's stories.

3. Rouen Secret Tours: This tour company specializes in unusual and off-the-beaten-path tours, including a guided tour of Rouen's art nouveau architecture and a tour of the city's hidden gardens. Their guides are knowledgeable and friendly, and can provide a unique perspective on the city's history.

These are just a few examples of the walking tours available in Rouen. Make sure to book in advance, as they can fill up quickly during peak season.
